name: Keto
description:
This is a demo\prototype for my game keto dawn on a fallen Eden the game story takes place at an unknown planet long before life on earth existed in this planet a strange matter that is though to be the source of life this matter broke the laws of physics when controlled opening portals between realms.on the unknown planet a civilization thrived with highly advanced technology and prosperity but when the emperor was corrupted by his greed for power he tried overusing the keto matter to create weapons monsters and corrupt soldiers people opposed him but no one could've stand his power the matter created a the guardian of the planet a creature purpose is to save all lifeforms bring balance between realms.

controls:

W,A,S,D move

Right click to shoot

1 to use a gun

2 to use a shotgun

3 to use an assault rifle

Space to jump 

You can double jump

You can Dash in 8 directions using the left control key.

ps: this game is a demo/prototype made with develop game engine the plan is to move to unity for better features and to make the best experience possible for you guys.

Your feedback is much appreciated.

Thank you for your support

I didn't make the assets they were made by different users here in itch.io.

Credit: 

Art: secret hideout,LuizMelo,ansimuz

Most of art wasn't done by me.

Music: Bensound.com
